rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with wheelchair accessible ramp. Large floor-to-ceiling windows ensure natural light and open view.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living area with ample seating space, integrated entertainment zone, and wide doorways for easy access. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls provide a seamless connection to the outdoor patio.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space adjoining the kitchen with accessibility features such as lowered counters and open circulation paths.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, wheelchair accessible kitchen with wide pathways. Features include an island counter for food prep and efficient layout to assist joint family usage.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Small room allocated near the kitchen area for domestic staff, designed to be compact yet functional, with necessary storage and easy access from service areas.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Heated swimming pool integrated into a landscaped outdoor area. Surrounded by seating arrangements and wheelchair accessible ramp leading to the pool deck.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling glass panels for natural light and Vastu compliant alignment.
Large windows to provide a harmonious flow with the kitchen area, ensuring proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Wheelchair accessible ramp connecting the living areas to the servant's quarters.
